name: NFL TAILGATE ROYALE
description:
Ready to host the best tailgate party in the lot and become a champion tailgater?


Enter one of the world’s best tailgate themed arenas where the fans are the stars, team allegiance is front and center, and rivalries are settled in a fun and playful way. NFL Tailgate Royale is a real-time multiplayer game where players compete head-to-head in classic battle royale style game play with a twist!



Place a Rally Flag, and your Tailgaters will change their behavior, drop what they’re doing and move or target an opponent, a wall or their BBQ Base. Advance your Tailgaters to push the dynamic scrimmage line towards your opponent’s tailgate while defending your own. The BBQ in the bed of the truck is your base and the heart of the Tailgate Party. If your opponent douses your grill, it’s party over.



• Please Note: Tournaments are available around the world, but real-prize tournaments are not available in the following states: Arizona, Arkansas, Connecticut, Delaware, Florida, Louisiana, Montana, South Carolina, South Dakota, Tennessee

• If you don't live in a region where real-prizes are available, you can still join the competition with our virtual currency tournaments.
